overview:
Maximilian Kuss is founder and CEO of â€œEuropean Media Holding AGâ€, one of Germany Ìs fastest growing privately owned media groups.

While he was still at university, he co-founded his first company, an international software company whose aim it was to act as a service company for local newspapers and agencies.

Today, Maximilian Kuss is involved in several media companies: Among others, he is the majority shareholder ofâ€œTarget Internet GmbHâ€, a fast growing software development company, which acts as an innovative incubator for young startups.

Further, Maximilian Kuss owns substantial stakes in other media-companies whose businesses are the development of industries software, IT, sports, ticketing, finance and TV broadcast.

Maximilian Kuss is probably one of the world’s youngest CEOs and certainly one of the youngest members of the international Entrepreneurs’ Organization with about 7,500 members in over 38 countries.
